```{r part-setup-{{this_part}}}
if (interactive()) {
  read_vc("part", root = root) |>
    slice_sample(n = 1) |>
    pull(id) -> this_part
} else {
  this_part <- {{this_part}}
}
```

```{r part-size-{{this_part}}}
plot_part <- display_part(
  this_part, root = root, label_border = FALSE, wall = "grey80",
  collapsed = "grey90", label_colour = "black", title = FALSE
)
fig_dim <- scale_display(plot_part)
```

```{r part-begin-landscape-{{this_part}}, eval = attr(fig_dim, "landscape"), results = "asis"}
cat("\\blandscape")
```

```{r fig-part-code-{{this_part}}, fig.height = fig_dim[1], fig.width = fig_dim[2], fig.align = "center", fig.cap = "{{this_title}}"}
plot_part
```

```{r part-end-landscape-{{this_part}}, eval = attr(fig_dim, "landscape"), results = "asis"}
cat("\\elandscape")
```
